entry.title: Friday night: Snow or ice pellets. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to ice pellets this evening then to snow near midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming north 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 late in the morning then light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023
